products.title: Eco Friendly Fr Cream Recycled Roller Blind
products.description: Their eco-friendly, recycled roller blinds are made from 100% pet recycled waste. Metre of fabric, 9 pet bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind.
